about_the_game:
Welcome to Lily Fantasia!

Lily Fantasia is a brand-new rhythm game with a piano theme!

Challenge powerful foes in Story Mode using the black and white keys, or play freely in Practice Room Mode and enjoy performing your favorite tunes.

Follow the music and begin a journey that’s truly your own.

The Magical World of Lily Fantasia

In a magical world where mythical beings live alongside humans, you are a gifted but unrecognized pianist. To care for your sick mother, you gave up the path of a concert pianist. But as her health declines and hope begins to fade, fate takes an unexpected turn. A mysterious vampire named Lily appears before you, granting you the power of a magical piano and inviting you on a wondrous musical adventure.

With the magical piano, you must defeat powerful enemies and obtain the legendary elixir, the “Golden Apple,” to save your mother’s life. But was this encounter mere chance or part of a greater plan? Is the power of the magical piano a blessing or a curse? Beneath the surface of the story lies an unsettling hint of mystery.

The truth awaits—only you can uncover it!

Practice Room Mode: Freedom to Play

Explore Practice Room Mode, featuring Story Mode tracks with a unique parry mechanic and along with a carefully curated selection of tracks from around the world! Each song offers three difficulty levels and various challenge modes.

Whether you’re a beginner or a seasoned rhythm game pro, you’ll find endless enjoyment in Lily’s Practice Room!

Features

  • A rhythm game brought to life with a rich fantasy narrative.

  • Experience music charts that move dynamically. (Thanks to the magical piano!)

  • Tackle three levels of difficulty and multiple challenge modes for every track.

  • Play songs with strategic parry mechanics or simply enjoy the thrill of performing music.
